body: @xXPrototype-ReaderXx The gingers have been saved thanks to you, you're a hero!

People with a low IQ believe that gingers are "soulless". However, this myth is false. Us gingers have souls, and we don't steal them either. We also have orange pu- wait that's too much information. We are tired of people bullying us for our physical appearances. A simple solution of this would be to dye our hair, but we shouldn't be pressured to do this. I want to feel safe going to 2nd grade every day with my 7 year old classmates, but I just get bullied instead. Gingers actually have souls, in fact, us gingers should be worshiped like gods. If you don't kneel, you should be put in gingerphobia jail with your loser friends. I am sick and tired of people not kneeling before me every day, and that is discrimination. I am a ginger that lives in the desert, so my life is hard enough (we are sensitive to the sun). I am going to suck the soul of every- I mean of course we don't suck souls. That must have been autocorrected!

The guy below me 👇 is lying.
